the wind rises is the last film from
Hayao Miyazaki and is a fictionalized
account of the creation and design of
Japanese warplanes in his review Nicolas
rippled rights between the earthquake
and sometimes apocalyptic dreams the

where some of cast the film's

miyazaki 72 has stated that this is his
